an7.22:1.5: ucchecchāmi → ucchejjissāmi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); ucchijjissāmi (mr) | anayabyasanaṃ āpādessāmī”ti → āpādessāmi vajjīti (mr)
an7.22:4.1: bījayamāno → vījayamāno (bj); vijamāno (cck, sya1ed); vījamāno (sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an7.22:12.1: Ekamekenapi → evaṃ vutte vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ekamekenapi (bj); ekamekenapi tena kho (mr)
